name: Flashcards for Kids. Animal sounds and puzzles
name_original: Flashcards for Kids. Animal sounds and puzzles
description:
The educational game for toddlers aged 1 - 5 years, has >250 sound flashcards with bright images of animals and birds which are divided into categories and 2 learning games.

Flashcards are an easy and interesting way for your child to help them recognize the world around them. Together with your child, you can watch wonderful images of different animals and birds, all while learning their names and listen to the animals sounds!

Children have a tremendous capacity for expanding their knowledge, especially during their first 5 years. That’s when they are most eager to learn new things, and playing with flashcards is an excellent way to satisfy their natural curiosity.

The learning flashcards for toddlers are into three groups: “domestic animals and pets”, “forest animals” or “animals of the world” (animals that live in Asia, Africa, Europe, North America and South America, Arctic and Antarctic, Australia and Oceania).

Features of Flashcards for kids:
⭐ In order to use this educational app, the child does not need to be able to read. Its simple interface and voice prompts allow even the youngest kid to play and learn by themselves!
⭐ Instead of drawings, which are not always easy to identify, the child will see beautiful, colorful photographs of animal and birds, which helps the child easily remember their names and features
⭐ Animal names in English, Russian, German, French, Spanish and Portuguese to maximize language skills

The additional learning games:
✔ Animal Puzzles - in this learning game, your smart kid will assemble the pictures of the various pets, domestic and wild animals of the planet from puzzle pieces. And after completion of each puzzle, the child will hear the real animal sounds and learn their names!
✔ Kids Quiz - after your toddler looks over and experiences the animal flashcards, there is a fun game waiting for them, which tests how much they’ve understood. Regardless of the number of correct answers, the child earns stars and is rewarded with thunderous applause 👏 and balloons 🎈!

The younger the child, the easier they absorb new information. Don’t delay!
